      • update

        public boolean update(TrialDefinition trialDefinition,
             Participant participant,
             Statistics strategyStatistics,
             int treatment)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update the statistics for this treatment arm, given the new patient.
        Specified by:
        update in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial object for which the statics should be updated
        participant - The enumeration index of the stratified group within the trial definitions for which the statics should be updated.
        strategyStatistics - The strategy statics which are to be updated on the data base.
        treatment - The treatment allocation arm that the patient have been assigned to.
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation was successful.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if something on the database side goes wrong.

      • getTrialDefinition

        public TrialDefinition getTrialDefinition(java.lang.String name)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Queries the database for a given trial definition object. If found, the object is reconstructed and returned.
        Specified by:
        getTrialDefinition in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the trial definition.
        Returns:
        Returns a TrialDefinition object, if it exists in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if something on the database side is going wrong.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the Strategy class provided in the TrialDefinition is not found.
